headline: Amcor Portfolio Review Puts Business Mix And Valuation In Focus
summary: Amcor (NYSE:AMCR) has begun a review of selected businesses within its portfolio. The process focuses on operations that account for a meaningful share of the company’s total sales. Management is considering options that could include divestitures or other changes to the group structure. Amcor operates as a global packaging company, supplying rigid and flexible packaging solutions to a wide range of consumer and industrial customers. A review of sizeable parts of its portfolio comes at a...
